title: How Did TVs Get So Cheap?
full_text: How Did TVs Get So Cheap?. A 50-inch TV that would have set you back $1,100 at Best Buy during Black Friday 2001 now costs less than $200, and the price per area-pixel -- a metric accounting for both screen size and resolution -- has dropped by more than 90% over the past 25 years.
